# Adversarial Attack Generator

A comprehensive tool for generating and analyzing adversarial examples using state-of-the-art attack methods.

## Features

- ğŸ¯ Multiple attack methods (FGSM, PGD, BIM, DeepFool, C&W)
- ğŸ—ï¸ Modern CNN architectures with batch normalization
- ğŸŒ Interactive Streamlit web interface
- ğŸ“Š Comprehensive evaluation metrics
- âš™ï¸ YAML-based configuration management
- ğŸ—„ï¸ SQLite database for storing results

## Quick Start

```bash
# Install dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt

# Train a model
python train.py

# Launch web interface
streamlit run app.py
```
